sentence.Network_en: It was the enemys boast of impregnability that caused their own defeat.
sentence.Network_cn: 敌人自我吹嘘战无不胜,这最终导致了他们自己的失败.

sentence.Network_en: Nerubian Weaver's supreme high speed attack disrupted enemys'time. made their body and brain not coordinate.
sentence.Network_cn: 地穴编织者极快的攻击扰乱了敌人的时间, 使敌人的身体与大脑时间不同步.

sentence.Network_en: If we attack quickly, we can nip the enemys plans in the bud.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我们迅速进攻, 我们可以把敌人的计划消灭在萌芽状态.
